mapper.select: SELECT c.* FROM apply_course a LEFT JOIN `user`u ON a.user_teacher_id = u.id LEFT JOIN course c ON a.course_id = c.id WHERE u.id = #{id}

SELECT stc.user_student_id AS id, u.user_name AS userName, stg.grade FROM stu_course stc INNER JOIN apply_course apc ON apc.course_id = stc.course_id LEFT JOIN stu_grade stg ON stg.course_id = stc.course_id INNER JOIN `user` u ON u.id = stc.user_student_id WHERE stc.course_id = #{courseId} AND stc.user_student_id in (SELECT stut.user_stu_id FROM stu_teacher stut WHERE stut.user_teacher_id =#{userId}) AND apc.user_teacher_id = #{userId} AND stc.`status` = 0
